headline: MRK Purchasers Have Opportunity to Lead Merck & Co., Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit
summary: NEW YORK, March 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, announces the filing of a class action lawsuit on behalf of purchasers of securities of Merck & Co., Inc. ...

headline: FDA Accepts Merck's Filing for Subcutaneous Version of Keytruda
summary: The filing is based on late-stage data, which shows that treatment with the subcutaneous version of MRK's Keytruda is at least as effective as the IV version.
